TableSettings.uniqueName: IdeConnections%23vhgstbclone_depositsselect o.created,o.last_ddl_time,s.* from (select owner,object_name,created,last_ddl_time from sys.all_objects where object_name = :OBJECT_NAME and owner = :OBJECT_OWNER and rownum = 1) o, (select * from all_mviews where owner = :OBJECT_OWNER and mview_name = :OBJECT_NAME) s where o.owner = s.owner and s.mview_name = o.object_name
